data.author: Derrick Bryson Taylor
data.title: New Pornographers Drummer Is Charged With Possession of Child Sexual Abuse Imagery
data.description: Joseph Seiders, who joined the band in 2014, is accused of recording boys who were using a restaurant bathroom.

data.author: Alice Jovanée
data.title: Newegg is offering another one day discount on Nintendo eShop gift cards
data.description: New games for the Nintendo Switch 2 can cost as much as $79.99, and some accessories can cost up to $109.99. But you can always count on friends at Newegg to help take the edge off with a deal that’ll save you some money at the Nintendo eShop. For today only, you can save $5 on every $50 gift card purchase for the Nintendo eShop. This promotion is valid for today only and is limited to purchases of $250 or less, but it’s an easy way to get a little extra bang for your buck. Just use the promo code SSERA438 at checkout to knock $5 off every $50 gift card purchase. As one review for this...

data.author: Cameron Faulkner
data.title: All the ways you should prep to pre-order a Nintendo Switch 2
data.description: Nintendo Switch 2 pre-orders are officially opening in the U.S. on April 24. This news comes after the original plan to open pre-orders on April 9 was delayed due to the “potential impact of tariffs.” Thankfully, the console isn’t increasing in price from what was originally announced — $449.99 for the console, with a $499.99 version that includes Mario Kart World. However, many of its optional accessories will cost you more (but not much more).While I wish to exist in a world where one could easily click “buy” once pre-orders open and be guaranteed a Switch 2 come the June 5...

data.title: Dave Roelvink opnieuw in de ring met Melvin Manhoef voor nieuwe reeks De ziekste dag
data.description: Dave Roelvink doet mee aan een nieuw seizoen van de onlineserie De ziekste dag van KRO-NCRV. Samen met bokser Melvin Manhoef stoomt hij een 15-jarige jongen klaar voor een bokswedstrijd.

data.title: Robbie Williams vindt het ’ongemakkelijk’ als fans op foto willen
data.description: Robbie Williams voelt zich vaak „ongemakkelijk” wanneer fans hem vragen om een foto. Op sociale mdia vertelt de zanger dat hij beroemd zijn lastig vindt, hoe dol hij ook is op zijn fans.

data.author: Matthew Reynolds
data.title: Pokémon Go ‘A Dazzling Aria’ Masterwork Research tasks and rewards so far
data.description: The “A Dazzling Aria” Masterwork Research is your opportunity to get a shiny Meloetta in Pokémon Go.Debuting alongside Go Tour: Unova, you have between Monday, Feb. 24, at 10 a.m. and Sunday, March 2, at 8 p.m. local time to purchase a ticket for $5 (or the local currency equivalent).You can then find the Masterwork Research in the Special Research tab, where you can take as much time as you need to complete every task — which, giving the nature of the challenges, makes it a necessity.As such, not every step has been revealed to players — but here are the “A Dazzling Aria” research...

data.description: CM Punk is sure Elon Musk was giving a Nazi salute at that Donald Trump inauguration event back in January ... and the WWE Superstar is adamant there's no amount of "gaslighting" the billionaire can do to sway his opinion. The 46-year-old wrestler…

data.title: What It Was Like to Edit the ‘Wolf Hall’ Books
data.description: The final novel in Hilary Mantel’s great trilogy has been adapted for TV. Her editor joins us this week to discuss working with Mantel on the books.

data.author: Susana Polo
data.title: Darth Maul will return again (again) for an animated series on Disney Plus
data.description: Lucasfilm is in production on a new solo animated series for the Star Wars villain you absolutely cannot keep down: Darth Maul. Despite him having been killed on screen by Obi-Wan Kenobi twice over, Darth Maul will anchor the newly announced series Maul: Shadow Lord.The Star Wars studio revealed the news in Friday’s Lucasfilm Animation’s 20th Anniversary panel at Star Wars Celebration 2025, in which Director Dave Filoni and Lucasfilm’s vice president of animation, Athena Portillo, treated the crowd to a whole trailer for Maul: Shadow Lord. Per Variety, the series takes place “about a...

data.author: Joshua Barone
data.title: In Hudson, N.Y., Even the Opera Is Locavore
data.description: At Hudson Hall, the director R.B. Schlather leans on artists and musicians from the community. The results have made for better opera.

data.author: Claire Fahy
data.title: Are Easter Baskets Getting Out of Hand?
data.description: Social media feeds are awash in images of lavish baskets overflowing with expensive gifts. Some parents are giving their children bikes. Others are pushing back.

data.author: Jessica Roy
data.title: ‘Love Island: Beyond the Villa’ Will Follow Season 6 Cast Around Los Angeles
data.description: Trying to capitalize on the success of the sixth season of “Love Island USA,” Peacock announced a series that would follow former islanders around Los Angeles.

data.author: Robert Daniels
data.title: Five Action Movies to Stream Now
data.description: This month’s picks include brave siblings and violent young men.

data.author: Tyler Colp
data.title: Assassin’s Creed Shadows is better as a solo protagonist game
data.description: I’m close to 60 hours into my playthrough of Assassin’s Creed Shadows and I refuse to play Yasuke. It didn’t take me 26 hours to unlock him, but even still, I’ve spent so much time investing in Naoe that Yasuke is effectively unplayable to me. I dread the story missions where I’m forced to play him. This is a ninja game to me, not a samurai game.It doesn’t help that you spend so much time with Naoe from the start. Once you get used to being a ninja crawling through bushes and lurking on rooftops, it’s really hard to go back to the more traditional Assassin’s Creed hero that is...

data.author: Kim Severson
data.title: Meat Is Back, on Plates and in Politics
data.description: After years in which “plant-based” was the mantra, meat once again dominates the national conversation about dinner.

data.title: Belgische prins Emmanuel in rolstoel na valpartij
data.description: Koning Filip en koningin Mathilde van België hebben op Witte Donderdag een mis bijgewoond in de kathedraal van het Spaanse Santiago de Compostella. Ook hun jongste kinderen prins Emmanuel en prinses Eléonore waren erbij.

data.author: Nicole Carpenter
data.title: Switch 2 accessories just got slightly more expensive in the US
data.description: Nintendo announced that it’s opening pre-orders for its Nintendo Switch 2 console on April 24 following a brief delay caused by U.S. tariff uncertainty. The console itself and games Mario Kart World and Donkey Kong Banzana remain at the originally announced prices. However, accessories have increased by about $1 to $10 each.“Nintendo Switch 2 accessories will experience price adjustments from those announced on April 2 due to changes in market conditions,” Nintendo said in a statement published on its website. “Other adjustments to the price of any Nintendo product are also possible in...

data.description: Ben Affleck wasn’t exactly out here saving Gotham -- more like saving himself from a full-body sweat-lodge meltdown ... all 'cause of that Batman suit, which he said made him sweaty AF. The movie star spilled all the salty tea, saying those suits…

data.title: Virale hit Lotje op eerste plek in Single Top 100
data.description: Het is de Utrechtse studentenvereniging U.V.S.V./N.V.V.S.U. gelukt om de eerste plaats in de Single Top 100 te veroveren. Het liedje Lotje, dat de afgelopen weken viraal ging, verslaat deze week Echte liefde is te koop van Samuel Welten, heeft samensteller GfK bekendgemaakt.

data.title: Liv Tyler found out Aerosmith frontman Steven Tyler was her biological father at his concert
data.description: Steven Tyler's daughter opened up about how she found out the rockstar was her biological father in a new interview. Liv Tyler also recalled meeting her sister for the first time.

data.author: Michael McWhertor
data.title: Switch 2 gets new pre-order date in late April for US
data.description: Nintendo has announced an updated date for Nintendo Switch 2 pre-orders in the United States. Originally scheduled for April 9, but delayed by news of tariffs, U.S. pre-orders will now begin on April 24.The company announced Friday that the console’s price will remain the same as originally announced — $449.99, with a $499.99 version that includes Mario Kart World. Pricing for both physical and digital versions of Mario Kart World ($79.99) and Donkey Kong Bananza ($69.99) will also remain unchanged.However, per the company’s statement, “Nintendo Switch 2 accessories will experience...

data.title: Kris Jenner emotioneel op verjaardag dochter Kourtney: ’Geschenk van God’
data.description: Kris Jenner staat vrijdag uitgebreid stil bij de 46e verjaardag van haar eerste kind, Kourtney Kardashian. „Mijn eerstgeborene, mijn geschenk van God, mijn prachtige Kourtney!”, aldus de realityster in een bericht op sociale media.

data.author: Zoë Hannah
data.title: Switch 2 launch game price unchanged for both physical and digital versions
data.description: Nintendo announced Friday via an update to its website that Nintendo Switch 2 launch games Mario Kart World and Donkey Kong Bananza will sell for $79.99 and $69.99 respectively, including both the physical and digital versions of the titles.Nintendo also delayed its pre-order for Switch 2 consoles from April 9 after Trump administration tariffs were announced April 2, the same day as the first Nintendo Direct focused on Switch 2. Pre-orders for the console and the launch bundle, which includes a digital edition of Mario Kart World, will go live on April 24. Despite speculation that the console...

data.author: Graham Bowley, Robin Pogrebin and Jennifer Schuessler
data.title: House Democrats Criticize Trump’s Smithsonian Order
data.description: In a letter to Vice President JD Vance, four U.S. representatives on a committee that oversees the cultural institution urged him to reject President Trump’s push to reshape it.
